name: Arcane Radius Revelation
description:
In a rectangle, two circles are inscribed, with centers at points ùëÇ1 and ùëÇ2.

Each circle touches three sides of the rectangle and passes through the center of the other circle,

as shown in the diagram. Find the distance between the centers of the circles,

given that the area of the rectangle is 'area'.
